wikipedia_page.main: William Thomas Phillipson (31 October 1898 – 19 November 1965) was an English footballer, who set a number of goalscoring records for Wolverhampton Wanderers.

response: * Tom Phillipson (1898–1965) –  footballer, several goal-scoring records for Wolverhampton Wanderers; became a businessman in Wolverhampton and town mayor.
